channel.title: Homepage on PhishDetect
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on PhishDetect

item.title: Download
item.description: Download In this page you can find links to install the PhishDetect Browser Extension. It is available for Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome (as well as Chromium). The browser extension is pre-configured to use a PhishDetect that we run. To configure a different node, please refer to the documentation. Mozilla Firefox Google Chrome If you are looking for instructions on how to download and set up a PhishDetect node refer to the documentation and our GitHub repositories.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: FAQ Do you read or have access to my emails? No. The operators of a PhishDetect node do not have access to your email account. The PhishDetect browser extension does not send any email anywhere. The PhishDetect browser extension is able to send to the configured node only a link and, in case you have it opened, the HTML content of the suspicious page you want checked, and only when manually requested by you.
